What fashion brands can learn from Nike's first six months as an Amazon partner - Digiday
s: March 15, 2023 - When Nike caved in and became an official first-party seller on Amazon this summer, it felt like a retail omen. If Nike — the world’s largest athletic company, earning $34 billion in revenue in 2017 — couldn’t hold out, who could? “You can’t ignore the fact that Amazon has the most powerful distribution system in the world. There’s just no denying that,” said Jim Fosina, CEO of Fosina Marketing Group. “Not even from a brand ...

t: The first-party audiences you need for Amazon Marketing Cloud
